auth_open_in_telegram: Please open this app via Telegram
home_owner_hint: Manage your channels, create listings, and track incoming deals from advertisers.
home_advertiser_hint: Search for channels, launch campaigns, and manage your advertising deals.
channel_bot_not_admin_hint: The bot has lost administrator rights in this channel. Auto-posting and stats verification will not work. Please re-add the bot as an admin in the channel settings.
channel_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this channel?
channel_delete_active_deals: This channel has {{count}} active deal(s). All deals will be cancelled and advertisers will be refunded.
channel_delete_bot_hint: Please remove the bot from channel admins manually in Telegram.

add_channel_waiting_hint: Select your channel in Telegram and confirm the bot as admin. This page will update automatically.
add_channel_timeout: Automatic detection timed out. You can enter the channel username manually.

listing_price_hint: Enter the listing price or desired payout — the other field will be calculated automatically

stats_no_data: No stats collected yet. Tap Refresh Stats to collect.
stats_rate_limited: Stats can only be refreshed once per hour
campaign_budget_max_error: Max budget cannot be less than min budget

deal_status_negotiation: Both parties are negotiating the terms. You can discuss details in the chat.
deal_status_owner_accepted: The channel owner has accepted the deal. Proceed to fund the escrow.
deal_status_awaiting_escrow_payment: Waiting for the advertiser to fund the escrow wallet.

deal_status_creative_pending_owner: Waiting for the channel owner to submit the creative.
deal_status_creative_submitted: Creative has been submitted for review.
deal_status_creative_changes_requested: Changes were requested for the creative.
deal_status_creative_approved: Creative is approved. The post will be scheduled.
deal_status_scheduled: The post is scheduled for publishing.

deal_status_retention_check: Verifying that the post meets retention requirements.
deal_status_released: Payment has been released to the channel owner.
deal_status_refunded: Payment has been refunded to the advertiser.
creative_waiting_owner: The creative will appear here once the channel owner submits it. You will receive a notification.
schedule_past_error: Cannot schedule in the past. Please select a future date and time.
schedule_waiting_owner: The publication date will appear here once the channel owner sets it. You will receive a notification.
posting_violation_refund: Refund initiated: {{reason}}. You will be notified when the transfer is complete.
posting_edited_violation: Post was edited during retention period
deal_bot_messaging_hint: Use the Telegram bot to send messages and submit creatives for this deal.
deal_action_confirm: Are you sure you want to perform this action?
escrow_verifying_hint: This usually takes 10–30 seconds. Please wait.
escrow_deposit_hint: Send exactly {{amount}} TON to the escrow address. The deposit will be verified automatically.
escrow_not_created_hint: The escrow contract has not been created yet. Click below to deploy it.

deal_owner_wallet_confirmed_hint: Payout wallet confirmed. You can change it before the escrow is created.

profile_wallet_hint: Connect your TON wallet to send and receive payments via escrow.
wallet_required_channel: Please connect your TON wallet first to add channels.
wallet_required_deal: Please connect your TON wallet to continue with this deal.
error_timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.
error_rate_limited: Too many requests. Please wait a moment.
empty_deals_description: Your deals will appear here once you create or receive one.
empty_channels_description: Add your first channel to start accepting ads.

empty_listings_description: Create a listing to start receiving deal offers.
empty_search_description: Try adjusting your filters or search for different channels.
campaign_search_empty_description: Try adjusting your filters or check back later for new campaigns.

campaign_proposal_note_placeholder: Add a note to the advertiser...
